Frequently Asked Questions

  1. What is Everit OSGI plugin?
  2. Where can I find examples?
What is Everit OSGI plugin?

Everit OSGi plugin helps to create distribution packages where the application runs on an OSGi container. It also makes it possible to run JUnit tests provided as OSGi services inside the established OSGi environment without the need of restarting the container between each test.

[top]

Where can I find examples?

There is a cookbook under construction that will contain step-by-step guides.

[top]
